articles.description: Botic van de Zandschulp has almost doubled his career victories tally in New York and is into his first major quarter-final, against world number two Daniil Medvedev, while Leylah Fernandez beat a major champion for the second straight time to reach the last …
articles.content: Dutch world number 117 Botic van de Zandschulp is into the quarter-finals of a major tournament for the first time, as is Canadian Leylah Fernandez, who continued her giant-killing ways one day befor… [+3169 chars]

articles.author: Andrew McGarry
articles.title: Dylan Alcott, Madison de Rozario, Mr Impossible, Afghan athletes and a world of difference: The best moments of the Tokyo Paralympics - ABC News
articles.description: In just under two short weeks in Tokyo, the Paralympics played out before a global audience, with superstars and newcomers alike making headlines. We look back at the best moments and stories.
articles.content:
The Tokyo Paralympics have come to a close.
Without the public, but with a wave of support on social media and from supporters watching at home, the competition flowed across 22 sports.
